title: Arcade Sona Sound Effects
body:
So I just got Arcade Sona, and when I first heard the new sound effects, I literally squealed.

I wasn't really planning on getting the skin anytime soon because it's an expensive one and I don't buy RP as often as i'd like, yet she ended up in my Snowdown Shop and I immediately went for it.

This is because I love video games (as per why i'm here), and the Arcade skins are definitely my favorite.

I didn't really know Arcade Sona had new sound effects for her attacks and abilities however, and it seriously made me super happy to hear 8-bit/16-bit (I still can't really tell which one it is but i'm leaning on 16) noises. I love classic games and their noises as well as their history and I don't know I decided i'd share how stupidly happy the skin made me :p

replies.body: Can I just tell you how happy this post made me? Out of every skin in the game, Arcade Sona is my absolutely favorite! ^-^
Arcade sona need a good recall, like Riven and Miss Fortune... good splash art too... know something for this?
We don't plan to add recalls to existing skins at this time. As for splash, some older art is being redone, but I don't believe these are on the list.

But would you do it... _for money?_
Like some kind of per champion upgrade pack that adds new recalls and maybe a few new quotes, brings them in to line with these new skins that seem to constantly spam global quotes and have 30 unique taunts for each enemy champion.
I'm looking at you Tahm and Illaoi, what the hell's up with you 2?

It could be like a 2nd generation chroma pack! Buy the "Caitlyn upgrade pack" and then when you inevitably buy all the remaining Caitlyn skins they'll all have special recalls and some extra quotes!
I personally think if we did this, we shouldn't be charging money for it, and it should be considered something more along the lines of a champion update.

So do I, but my impression is that champion updates and reworks and such take forever and I want it _nooooooow_.
C'mon be cool. I'll be your friend.

oooh that is always good news ^^
i just hope BM Akali isn't one as i know it's old but i LOVE IT SO MUCH *.*{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}  , i think at some point i'll actually print it and put on my wall it's a piece of art.

p.s:i don't even like akali that much XD
i would love a hint on older splash arts your might be working on

Hey Katey! I'm hijacking this thread to say I'M SO HAPPY WE GET A NEW MORG SKIN <3 And I totes love it and can't wait to buy it! I'm sad I don't get to go to the beta and test it but she looks gorgeous from here!

Is there any plan on giving Sona's joke fitting sounds on each skin? I know it's not the norm for skins, but she revolves around music, it's weird to have her smash on an invisible piano independently on wether she's playing a Guqin, a weird celestial Guqin, an arcade console, a death metal synth/organ...
I mean it wouldn't take long to do either, it's like 6 sounds that work for all languages.
We don't have plans currently to do so.

Awwh i'm glad it made you happy, makes me happy to know haha.
